title: Workshopper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, receive a random role in the game besides Workshopper. You can't receive the same role twice. You can propose changes to its existing attributes, abilities and flavour text.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Workshopper is not supposed to be able to drastically alter abilities, only edit them minorly. Major edits, defined by host discretion, should not be allowed.
- In the morning, the host will post your proposed changes (preferably in a different channel). 
- All alive players in the game can anonymously vote on whether or not your changes should be accepted.
- If the majority of alive players vote for the changes to go through, any instances of the role within the game will be changed starting the following night. 
- Any players with the role you're changing must also accept the changes for your workshopping to be successful. 
- You have Basic defense until the first time you're attacked.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have your workshopping be accepted thrice.

desc:
Post 555
*Sometimes, some midgame rebalancing is necessary, right?*
